channel.title: Posts on Ada Does

item.title: Hello World, And All Who Inhabit It
item.description: Hello, World! I’m Ada, and this is my blog! A little about me: I’m a software developer, teacher, maker, tinkerer, open source evangelist, and lots of other things! I’m currently a senior coordinator at RCOS, the Rensselaer Center for Open Source, which is where I spend most of my time. I love teaching and learning from my peers, developing curriculum, giving talks, and maintaining my open source project, Yacs. I’m also involved with MOSSN, the Mozilla Open Source Student Network, where I work with and advise other campus clubs from around the country!
